techmeme.title: Indian e-commerce giant Flipkart quietly rolls out its own payments app, Super.money, after separating from India's largest payments app PhonePe in 2022 (Manish Singh/TechCrunch)
Sources: YouTube is in talks with Sony, Warner, and Universal to license their songs for an AI music generation tool that mimics popular singers (Financial Times)
Fetcherr, which wants to let airlines provide dynamic pricing by using AI to forecast demand, raised a $90M Series B, bringing its total funding to $114.5M (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Creatio, which offers a no-code CRM and workflow automation platform, raised $200M led by Sapphire Ventures at a $1.2B valuation (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
Data connectivity software provider CData raised ~$350M led by Warburg Pincus, source says at a $800M+ valuation, and says it expects $100M in ARR by 2024 end (Reuters)
